column4: so any one who can tell me what to do if kernel panics or i am in grub shell, and have no access to grub menu?
but it works, as soon as i install ubuntu, and stops working, as soon as i update my kernel, so i hardly think it is hardware
id let memtest run a bit to verify..   it would seem very odd that  the last dozen or so kernel updates would all ahve the same issue..
